rugbyclaw results

Docs version: v0.1.3 • GitHub Releases

View recent rugby match results with personality-driven summaries

Usage

rugbyclaw results [league] [options]

Examples

View all recent results

rugbyclaw results

Shows recent results across all your favorite leagues.

Filter by league

rugbyclaw results top14
rugbyclaw results premiership
rugbyclaw results six_nations

Options

Option Description Default
--json Output as JSON false
--days Number of days back 7

Match Summaries

Results include personality-driven summaries based on the outcome:

  • Big wins: "Absolute clinic. That wasn't a match, that was a statement."
  • Close wins: "Heart attack rugby. Clenched the whole second half."
  • Losses: "Let's not talk about it. Pain. Moving on."

Tips

  • Check Monday mornings for weekend results
  • Use --days 14 for two weeks of history
  • Combine with rugbyclaw team last for specific teams

Related Commands

  • rugbyclaw scores - Today's matches
  • rugbyclaw fixtures - Upcoming matches
  • rugbyclaw team - Team-specific queries
